Class NewsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • NewsController

  • public class NewsController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class controls all the users actions with the view and sends variations of code to the model on button press
    Author:
    cglen

      This allows the user to delete a newsStory
      private class  NewsController.DeleteNewsStoryListListener
      When pressed, this class deletes all news stories

      Allows user to edit a newsMaker

      Exports file when button is pressed

      Imports file when button is pressed

      This allows user to remove 1 or more stories from the list
